title: Problem with German Model

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
Currently i am trying to setup multiple models with master branch (Time of writing  [2edab4](https://github.com/mozilla/TTS/commit/2edab4b3f9b5ad4352126ba6d52878b71d8e2cb3) ).

I successfully could use Tacotron2 DDC both for English and French from [released Models](https://github.com/mozilla/TTS/wiki/Released-Models).

But when i try to run the german one from there, i get following error:

> Traceback (most recent call last):
>   File "./TTS/TTS/bin/synthesize.py", line 218, in <module>
>     main()
>   File "./TTS/TTS/bin/synthesize.py", line 177, in main
>     synthesizer = Synthesizer(model_path, config_path, vocoder_path, vocoder_config_path, args.use_cuda)
>   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/TTS/utils/synthesizer.py", line 47, in __init__
>     use_cuda)
>   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/TTS/utils/synthesizer.py", line 93, in load_tts
>     self.tts_model.load_checkpoint(tts_config, tts_checkpoint, eval=True)
>   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/TTS/tts/models/tacotron_abstract.py", line 125, in load_checkpoint
>     state = torch.load(checkpoint_path, map_location=torch.device('cpu'))
>   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 595, in load
>     return _legacy_load(opened_file, map_location, pickle_module, **pickle_load_args)
>   File "/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 774, in _legacy_load
>     result = unpickler.load()
> ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'mozilla_voice_tts'

As discussed [here](https://discourse.mozilla.org/t/using-a-model-trainned-back-when-the-module-was-named-mozilla-voice-tts/67970), this already was a problem somewhere in the past, but it seems it is still valid for an edge-case?
